summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Export Applications to Excel feature. All 9 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed - Select All checkbox, individual selection, Export button, and floating action bar all working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/applications-session/export returns 401 if not authenticated
Backend: POST /api/applications-session/export returns 400 if no application_ids provided
Backend: POST /api/applications-session/export returns valid ZIP file (application/zip content-type)
Backend: ZIP contains Data_Lamaran.xlsx file
Backend: ZIP contains CV/ folder with resume files (PDF and PNG verified)
Backend: Export works with multiple applications selected
Backend: Export returns 404 for invalid/non-existent application IDs
Backend: Export only returns applications from authenticated user's company
Backend: Excel has required columns (No, Posisi, Departemen, Status, Tanggal Melamar)
Frontend: 'Pilih semua' checkbox visible above application list
Frontend: Clicking 'Pilih semua' selects all visible applications
Frontend: Text changes to 'Batal pilih semua' after selecting all
Frontend: 'Export Excel (N)' button appears when applications are selected
Frontend: Export button shows correct selection count
Frontend: Export button triggers ZIP file download
Frontend: Success toast 'Berhasil export N data lamaran' appears after export
Frontend: Individual application checkboxes work for selection
Frontend: Floating action bar appears when 2+ applications selected
Frontend: Floating bar shows 'Bandingkan' (Compare) button
Frontend: Floating bar shows 'Export' button
Frontend: Floating bar shows selected count (N dipilih)
Frontend: Clear selection (X) button in floating bar works
seed_data_creation: No test data created - used existing 2 applications (Tawakal and Muhammad Iqbal Tawakal)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Export Applications feature fully tested. Backend endpoint at POST /api/applications-session/export with session-based auth (cookies). Frontend component at ApplicationsTab.jsx. Key data-testids: select-all-checkbox, export-excel-btn, floating-export-btn, compare-bar, compare-btn, compare-check-{app_id}. Export returns ZIP containing Data_Lamaran.xlsx and CV/ folder with resume files. Current test data: 2 applications - one with PDF resume, one with PNG resume.

error_codes.404: No applications found for given IDs
